Sentencas: A solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC)-internal combustion engine (ICE) hybrid system is proposed and analyzed.
Titulo: Solid oxide fuel cell-internal combustion engine hybrid system utilizing an internal combustion engine for anode off-gas recirculation, external reforming, and additional power generation

Sentencas: Although the existing SOFC-ICE hybrid system improves the efficiency of the SOFC stand-alone system by deriving additional power from the anode off-gas in the ICE, the proposed hybrid system further increases the system efficiency by utilizing the ICE for anode off-gas recirculation, external reforming, and additional power generation.
Titulo: Solid oxide fuel cell-internal combustion engine hybrid system utilizing an internal combustion engine for anode off-gas recirculation, external reforming, and additional power generation

Sentencas: Accordingly, we developed models for the SOFC and ICE and performed simulations to understand the operational characteristics of the hybrid system.
Titulo: Solid oxide fuel cell-internal combustion engine hybrid system utilizing an internal combustion engine for anode off-gas recirculation, external reforming, and additional power generation

Sentencas: Through simulation, the influence of each control parameter was analyzed, and the system operable ranges were determined according to the rate of system heat loss.
Titulo: Solid oxide fuel cell-internal combustion engine hybrid system utilizing an internal combustion engine for anode off-gas recirculation, external reforming, and additional power generation

Sentencas: When the heat loss considered is the least, a gross system efficiency of 66.9% is achieved at the optimum point.
Titulo: Solid oxide fuel cell-internal combustion engine hybrid system utilizing an internal combustion engine for anode off-gas recirculation, external reforming, and additional power generation

Sentencas: Thus, this study developed a high-efficiency SOFC-ICE hybrid system by combining methods that utilize the ICE as a recirculation blower, reformer, and power generator.
Titulo: Solid oxide fuel cell-internal combustion engine hybrid system utilizing an internal combustion engine for anode off-gas recirculation, external reforming, and additional power generation
